overview: Juice=Juice Miyamoto Karin Birthday Event 2020 (Juice=Juice 宮本佳林バースデーイベント2020) is Miyamoto Karin's upcoming 22nd birthday event. Two shows took place on December 1, 2020 at Ota Ward Hall and Abrico Large Hall. The event is for fanclub members and a DVD will be released after the event.  In compliance with government policy due to the coronavirus pandemic, cheering, crowding, standing, and closeness in the venue are prohibited, and wearing masks will be required to enter.[1]  From December 5 to December 6, 2020, a recording of the event was digitally distributed to fanclub members who apply.[2]  The deadline to pre-order the fanclub-exclusive DVD was on February 26, 2021, and it will be released to fanclub members in April 2021.
title: Juice=Juice Miyamoto Karin Birthday Event 2020
